text_en: The learner use a blindfold and canÂ´t check what is displayed on the screen.
text_sw: Mwanafunzi anatumia kitambaa kufunika macho ili asione na hawezi kuhakiki kinachoonekana kwenye skrini

text_en: The students have been blind late in life.
They must learn to operate computers without a screen or a mouse.
He must rely on the keyboard and the sound.
She must create a virtual image of how a computer works.
